mehidi kansa ha heroyin jawarame yedunu sakakaruwan wadi pirisak ragama pradeshayen athadanguwata gath bawa jaala surabadu sthanadhipathi aar. ee. di. indranath mahatha pawasiya.kasippu sprithu litar 15 k, kansa miligram 1950 k, heroyin miligram 1500 k, surabadu niladharin athadanguwata gena atha.sodisi meheyumen athadanguwata gath sakakaruwan wisi dena gampaha ha kanuwana mahesthrath adhikarana wetha idiripath kirimen pasu mahesthrathwaru sakakaruwanata rupiyal eklaksha panas dahas pansiyayaka dada mudalak gewana lesa niyama kaleya.jaala surabadu adhikari kirthi perera, surabadu sthanadhipathi aar. ee. di. indranath yana mahathwarunge upades matha parikshakawarun wana es. ke. rajapaksha, sarayan mejar dayas kulasinha, niyamakawarun wana sampath warakagoda bandara, herath, riyaduru kure yana mahathwaru mema watalima sidu kalaha..
